title: Plastic Ban in effect! What next?
tags: Proclamation No. 1383/2025;Naja Bertolt Jensen;Unsplash;Teki paper bags is one example;Powers of Africa: Lilia Habboul;_The Ocean Cleanup — technology and research focused on removing plastics from ocean gyres and preventing river inputs._;_Plastic Bank — social-enterprise model that incentivizes collection and recycling through community payments._;_WWF and Greenpeace — advocacy, research, and campaigns to reduce single-use plastics and push corporate commitments._
